mapper.insert: insert into userinformation(id, name, sex, age, phone, qq, birthday, address, email, dId) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age},#{phone},#{qq},#{birthday}, #{address}, #{email}, #{department.id})
mapper.update: update userinformation set name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, phone = #{phone}, qq = #{qq}, birthday = #{birthday}, address = #{address}, email = #{email}, note = #{note} , dId = #{department.id} where id = #{id}
update userinformation set image_url = #{imageUrl} where id = #{id}
